thread.title: Will Smith Lives Out His 20-Year-Long Dream of Bungee Jumping at Victoria Falls
thread.title_full: Will Smith Lives Out His 20-Year-Long Dream of Bungee Jumping at Victoria Falls

author: Monica Sisavat
title: Will Smith Lives Out His 20-Year-Long Dream of Bungee Jumping at Victoria Falls

organizations.name: victoria falls will smith bungee jumping

text:
Will Smith Bungee Jumping at Victoria Falls Video 2017 Will Smith Lives Out His 20-Year-Long Dream of Bungee Jumping at Victoria Falls March 11, 2017 6 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
Will Smith is currently vacationing in Africa, and on Friday, the actor lived out his 20-year-long dream when he went bungee jumping at Victoria Falls. TMZ uploaded the video to their site, showing the 48-year-old falling from the bridge over the waterfall on the Zambia-Zimbabwe border. As Will dangles in the air, he tells the camera, "This is crazy . . . I've been wanting to do this for like 20 years." Will is gearing up for the release of his new Netflix film, Brighter , but it seems he had vacation on the brain ahead of his promotional tour.
